com.netflix.genie.server.metrics
Class JobCountManager

java.lang.Object
  com.netflix.genie.server.metrics.JobCountManager

public final class JobCountManager
extends java.lang.Object

Utility class to get number of jobs running on this instance.

Method Summary
static java.lang.String getIdleInstance(int minJobThreshold)
          Returns the most idle Genie instance (< minJobThreshold running jobs), if possible - else returns current instance.
static int getNumInstanceJobs()
          Get number of running jobs running on this instance.
static int getNumInstanceJobs(java.lang.Long minStartTime, java.lang.Long maxStartTime)
          Get number of running jobs with minStartTime < startTime > maxStartTime on this instance min/max startTimes are ignored if they are null.

getNumInstanceJobs

public static int getNumInstanceJobs()
                              throws CloudServiceException
Get number of running jobs running on this instance.

Returns:
number of running jobs on this instance
Throws:
CloudServiceException - if there is an error

getNumInstanceJobs

public static int getNumInstanceJobs(java.lang.Long minStartTime,
                                     java.lang.Long maxStartTime)
                              throws CloudServiceException
Get number of running jobs with minStartTime < startTime > maxStartTime on this instance min/max startTimes are ignored if they are null.

Parameters:
minStartTime - min start time in ms
maxStartTime - max start time in ms
Returns:
number of running jobs between the specified times
Throws:
CloudServiceException - if there is an error

getNumInstanceJobs

public static int getNumInstanceJobs(java.lang.String hostName,
                                     java.lang.Long minStartTime,
                                     java.lang.Long maxStartTime)
                              throws CloudServiceException
Get number of running jobs with minStartTime < startTime < maxStartTime min/max startTimes are ignored if they are null.

Parameters:
hostName - - if null, local host name is used
minStartTime - min start time in ms
maxStartTime - max start time in ms
Returns:
number of running jobs matching specified critiera
Throws:
CloudServiceException - if there is an error

getIdleInstance

public static java.lang.String getIdleInstance(int minJobThreshold)
                                        throws CloudServiceException
Returns the most idle Genie instance (< minJobThreshold running jobs), if possible - else returns current instance.

Parameters:
minJobThreshold - the threshold to use to look for idle instances
Returns:
host name of most idle Genie instance
Throws:
CloudServiceException - if there is any error
